message.content:
1. Patients with glaucoma have follow-up eye care appointments.
2. Not keeping these follow-up appointments can lead to more severe ocular disease.
3. Glaucoma is an ocular disease.

messages.content:
Statement: Patients with glaucoma who do not keep their follow-up eye care appointments are at risk for developing more severe ocular disease.

List all the facts we explicitly know from the statement. Make each fact as atomic as possible.
